product_name: Smith Dolen ChromaPop Polarized Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: The Smith Dolen ChromaPop Sunglasses deliver unmatched clarity and color optimization with a refined, classic shape that's perfect for road trips or urban explorations. ChromaPop lenses optimize color and increase clarity, enabling you to see the outside world with an unparalled level of true colors and vibrance. Polarized polycarbonate lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Black frames feature gray-green tinted lenses, ideal for medium-to-bright light. Matte Black frames feature platinum tinted lenses, ideal for bright days and direct sunlight. Havana frames feature brown tinted lenses that enhance your vision in a wide range of light and weather conditions. Hydrophilic Megol nosepiece and temple ends become tackier when wet for reliable grip during exercise and hot weather. 53% bio-based Evolve frames are made with Rilsan(R) Clear, a light, durable, non-petroleum-based material derived from renewable, non-GMO castor plants.
short_description: The Smith Dolen ChromaPop Sunglasses deliver unmatched clarity and color optimization with a refined, classic shape that's perfect for road trips or urban explorations.
